meanings.sent1: The ripening of the fruit was evident by its bright color and sweet smell.

meanings.sent3: The ripening of the banana made it the star of the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent4: The ripening of friendship requires patience and understanding.

meanings.definition: The act of maturing or developing to a desired state.
meanings.sent1: The ripening of her skills led to her success in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The ripening of the plan required careful execution and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The ripening of the idea sparked excitement among the team.
meanings.sent4: The ripening of the relationship between the two countries brought about peace.
meanings.sent5: The ripening of his talent as a musician was evident in his latest performance.
